comment: /**  * Suspends the service.  *  * @throws Exception is thrown if suspending failed  */
code: /**  * Suspends the service.  *  * @throws Exception is thrown if suspending failed  */ void suspend() throws Exception.

comment: /**  * Resumes the service.  *  * @throws Exception is thrown if resuming failed  */
code: /**  * Resumes the service.  *  * @throws Exception is thrown if resuming failed  */ void resume() throws Exception.

comment: /**  * Tests whether the service is suspended or not.  *  * @return <tt>true</tt> if suspended  */
code: /**  * Tests whether the service is suspended or not.  *  * @return <tt>true</tt> if suspended  */ boolean isSuspended().
